title: Landmarks Listed in Article 10 of the San Francisco Planning Code
description: A. SUMMARY Historic Landmarks Listed in Article 10 of the San Francisco Planning Code B. HOW THE DATASET IS CREATED Created by the the San Francisco Planning Department. Areas represent parcel boundaries or streets listed in Article 10 of the Planning Code C. UPDATE PROCESS Automated to refresh daily. The data contents are updated a few times a year when new sites are approved by the Historic Preservation Commission. D. HOW TO USE THIS DATASET For further information: https://codelibrary.amlegal.com/codes/san_francisco/latest/sf_planning/0-0-0-27871

columns.name: LandmarkNo
columns.description: Landmark Number, as listed in the San Francisco Planning Code

columns.name: YearDesignated
columns.description: Year that the landmark was designated.

columns.name: DesignationDocument
columns.description: Document that details the designation of the landmark.

columns.name: Photo
columns.description: Link to a photo of the landmark.

columns.name: PIMLink
columns.description: Link to the landmark on the San Francisco Property Information Map.
